queries.question: Smerovi koji traju 4 godine

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "комплексно") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "напредн")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Koji smerovi sadrže teže i napredne koncepte programiranja?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program(COUNT(?course ) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course .
  ?course ns1:has_knowledge_area <http://example.org/ka/CE-CAE_Circuits_and_Electronics>
}
GROUP BY ?program 
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Koji smerovi se bave elektrotehnikom?
Koliko godina traje smer SIIT?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "робот") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "хардвер")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Na kojem smeru ću imati priliku da programiram robote i da se bolje upoznam sa hardverom?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "тимск") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "у тиму") ||
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "груп")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY ASC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Koji smer je dobar za samostalno istraživanje i učenje bez rada u timu?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>

SELECT ?program (COUNT(DISTINCT ?knowledge_area) AS ?knowledgeCount)
WHERE {
  ?program ns1:has_course ?course .
  ?course ns1:has_knowledge_area ?knowledge_area .
}
GROUP BY ?program 
ORDER BY DESC(?knowledgeCount)
LIMIT 5
queries.question: Koji smer nudi širok spektar znanja a ne usku specijalizaciju?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "робот") || 
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "актуатор")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Koji smerovi su vezani za ucenje robotike?

queries.query:
PREFIX ns1: <http://example.org/course/>
SELECT ?program (COUNT(?course) AS ?courseCount)
WHERE {
 ?program ns1:has_course ?course.
  ?course ns1:has_content ?content.
FILTER(
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "plc") || 
    CONTAINS(LCASE(?content), "плц")
  )}
GROUP BY ?program
ORDER BY DESC(?courseCount)
Limit 5
queries.question: Na kojim smerovima se uči PLC programiranje?
